data.title: Everything You Need To Know About The 2024 Golden Globes
data.meta_description: Vogue charts everything you need to know about the 2024 Golden Globe Awards, including the date, nominations, times and hosts. What’s going on with the Golden Globes 2024? Here is everything we know so far and all the latest news.
data.text:
The 2024 Golden Globes ceremony was an eventful night, to say the least. Below, find everything you need to know about the 2024 Golden Globe Awards, including the complete list of winners.

Read more: Golden Globes 2024 Red Carpet

Who won a Golden Globe in 2024?

See the full list of winners, below.

Anatomy of a Fall

Killers of the Flower Moon

Maestro

When did the 2024 Golden Globes take place?

The ceremony took place on 7 January, and aired live in the US on CBS and streamed on Paramount+.

Who hosted the 2024 Golden Globes?

The comedian and actor Jo Koy hosted, in a stint that proved divisive.

Who attended the 2024 Golden Globes?

Everyone from Timothée Chalamet and Kylie Jenner to Jennifer Lawrence and Emma Stone.
